verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> of the valley חִזָּי֑וֹן <S%H2384><s%> of vision מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לָּ֣ךְ אֵפ֔וֹא <S%H645><s%> What aileth thee now כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָלִ֥ית <S%H5927><s%> that thou art wholly gone up כֻּלָּ֖ךְ <S%H3605><s%> you have all לַגַּגּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1406><s%> roof

תְּשֻׁא֣וֹת ׀ <S%H8663><s%> of stirs מְלֵאָ֗ה <S%H4395><s%> fruit עִ֚יר <S%H5892><s%> city הֽוֹמִיָּ֔ה <S%H1993><s%> a tumultuous קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> city עַלִּיזָ֑ה <S%H5947><s%> a joyous חֲלָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2491><s%> thy slain לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> [men are] not slain חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> Nor מֵתֵ֥י <S%H4191><s%> nor dead מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> in battle

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All קְצִינַ֥יִךְ <S%H7101><s%> All thy rulers נָֽדְדוּ־ <S%H5074><s%> are fled יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> together מִקֶּ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> by the archers אֻסָּ֑רוּ <S%H631><s%> they are bound כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All נִמְצָאַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H4672><s%> all that are found אֻסְּר֣וּ <S%H631><s%> in thee are bound יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together מֵרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far בָּרָֽחוּ׃ <S%H1272><s%> [which] have fled

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָמַ֛רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Therefore said שְׁע֥וּ <S%H8159><s%> I Look away מִנִּ֖י <S%H4480><s%> away אֲמָרֵ֣ר <S%H4843><s%> bitterly בַּבֶּ֑כִי <S%H1065><s%> from me I will weep אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּאִ֣יצוּ <S%H213><s%> labour לְנַֽחֲמֵ֔נִי <S%H5162><s%> not to comfort עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning שֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> me because of the spoiling בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> has a יוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> For [it is] a day מְהוּמָ֨ה <S%H4103><s%> of trouble וּמְבוּסָ֜ה <S%H4001><s%> and of treading down וּמְבוּכָ֗ה <S%H3998><s%> and of perplexity לַֽאדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> by the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּגֵ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> in the valley חִזָּי֑וֹן <S%H2384><s%> of vision מְקַרְקַ֥ר <S%H6979><s%> breaking קִ֖ר <S%H7023><s%> down the walls וְשׁ֥וֹעַ <S%H7771><s%> and of crying אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> to the mountains

וְעֵילָם֙ <S%H5867><s%> And Elam נָשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> bare אַשְׁפָּ֔ה <S%H827><s%> the quiver בְּרֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> with chariots אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of men פָּֽרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> [and] horsemen וְקִ֥יר <S%H7024><s%> and Kir עֵרָ֖ה <S%H6168><s%> uncovered מָגֵֽן׃ <S%H4043><s%> the shield

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> Then מִבְחַר־ <S%H4005><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] thy choicest עֲמָקַ֖יִךְ <S%H6010><s%> valleys מָ֣לְאוּ <S%H4390><s%> shall be full רָ֑כֶב <S%H7393><s%> of chariots וְהַפָּ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> and the horsemen שֹׁ֖ת <S%H7896><s%> shall set שָׁ֥תוּ <S%H7896><s%> themselves in array הַשָּֽׁעְרָה׃ <S%H8179><s%> at the gate

וַיְגַ֕ל <S%H1540><s%> And he discovered אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מָסַ֣ךְ <S%H4539><s%> the covering יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַתַּבֵּט֙ <S%H5027><s%> and thou didst look בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on נֶ֖שֶׁק <S%H5402><s%> to the armour בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הַיָּֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> of the forest

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> בְּקִיעֵ֧י <S%H1233><s%> also the breaches עִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> of the city דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> of David רְאִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7200><s%> Ye have seen כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָ֑בּוּ <S%H7235><s%> abundance וַֽתְּקַבְּצ֔וּ <S%H6908><s%> and ye gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַבְּרֵכָ֖ה <S%H1295><s%> pool הַתַּחְתּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8481><s%> of the lower

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem סְפַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H5608><s%> And ye have numbered וַתִּתְֿצוּ֙ <S%H5422><s%> have ye broken down הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> and the houses לְבַצֵּ֖ר <S%H1219><s%> to fortify הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <S%H2346><s%> the wall

וּמִקְוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H4724><s%> also a ditch עֲשִׂיתֶ֗ם <S%H6213><s%> Ye made בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between הַחֹ֣מֹתַ֔יִם <S%H2346><s%> between the two walls לְמֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> for the water הַבְּרֵכָ֣ה <S%H1295><s%> pool הַיְשָׁנָ֑ה <S%H3465><s%> of the old וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִבַּטְתֶּם֙ <S%H5027><s%> but ye have not looked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on עֹשֶׂ֔יהָ <S%H6213><s%> unto the maker וְיֹצְרָ֥הּ <S%H3335><s%> unto him that fashioned מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> it long ago לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor רְאִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H7200><s%> thereof neither had respect

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> call אֲדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> did the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לִבְכִי֙ <S%H1065><s%> to weeping וּלְמִסְפֵּ֔ד <S%H4553><s%> and to mourning וּלְקָרְחָ֖ה <S%H7144><s%> and to baldness וְלַחֲגֹ֥ר <S%H2296><s%> and to girding שָֽׂק׃ <S%H8242><s%> with sackcloth

וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> behold שָׂשׂ֣וֹן <S%H8342><s%> And behold joy וְשִׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8057><s%> and gladness הָרֹ֤ג ׀ <S%H2026><s%> slaying בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> oxen וְשָׁחֹ֣ט <S%H7819><s%> and killing צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep אָכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> eating בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וְשָׁת֣וֹת <S%H8354><s%> and drinking יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine אָכ֣וֹל <S%H398><s%> let us eat וְשָׁת֔וֹ <S%H8354><s%> and drink כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> for to morrow נָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> we shall die

וְנִגְלָ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> And it was revealed בְאָזְנָ֖י <S%H241><s%> in mine ears יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Surely יְ֠כֻפַּר <S%H3722><s%> shall not be purged הֶעָוֹ֨ן <S%H5771><s%> Surely this iniquity הַזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> this לָכֶם֙ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until תְּמֻת֔וּן <S%H4191><s%> from you till ye die אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts פ

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> Come בֹּא֙ <S%H935><s%> get אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַסֹּכֵ֣ן <S%H5532><s%> thee unto this treasurer הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge שֶׁבְנָ֖א <S%H7644><s%> [even] unto Shebna אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> which [is] over the house

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לְּךָ֥ פֹה֙ <S%H6311><s%> here וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and whom לְךָ֣ פֹ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> have here כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that חָצַ֧בְתָּ <S%H2672><s%> What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here that thou hast hewed thee out לְּךָ֛ פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here קָ֑בֶר <S%H6913><s%> a sepulchre חֹצְבִ֤י <S%H2672><s%> [as] he that heweth him out מָרוֹם֙ <S%H4791><s%> on high קִבְר֔וֹ <S%H6913><s%> a sepulchre חֹקְקִ֥י <S%H2710><s%> [and] that graveth בַסֶּ֖לַע <S%H5553><s%> rock מִשְׁכָּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> an habitation לֽוֹ׃

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Behold the LORD מְטַלְטֶלְךָ֔ <S%H2904><s%> will carry thee away טַלְטֵלָ֖ה <S%H2925><s%> captivity גָּ֑בֶר <S%H1397><s%> with a mighty וְעֹטְךָ֖ <S%H5844><s%> and will surely עָטֹֽה׃ <S%H5844><s%> cover

צָנ֤וֹף <S%H6801><s%> He will surely יִצְנָפְךָ֙ <S%H6801><s%> violently turn צְנֵפָ֔ה <S%H6802><s%> and toss כַּדּ֕וּר <S%H1754><s%> thee [like] a ball אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country רַחֲבַ֣ת <S%H7342><s%> A vast יָדָ֑יִם <S%H3027><s%> able שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There תָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> there shalt thou die וְשָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> and there מַרְכְּב֣וֹת <S%H4818><s%> and there the chariots כְּבוֹדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3519><s%> of thy glory קְל֖וֹן <S%H7036><s%> [shall be] the shame בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲדֹנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H113><s%> of thy lord's
וַהֲדַפְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H1920><s%> And I will drive מִמַּצָּבֶ֑ךָ <S%H4673><s%> thee from thy station וּמִמַּעֲמָֽדְךָ֖ <S%H4612><s%> and from thy state יֶהֶרְסֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2040><s%> shall he pull thee down

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> I וְקָרָ֣אתִי <S%H7121><s%> that I will call לְעַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant לְאֶלְיָקִ֖ים <S%H471><s%> Eliakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִלְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H2518><s%> of Hilkiah

וְהִלְבַּשְׁתִּ֣יו <S%H3847><s%> And I will clothe כֻּתָּנְתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H3801><s%> him with thy robe וְאַבְנֵֽטְךָ֙ <S%H73><s%> him with thy girdle אֲחַזְּקֶ֔נּוּ <S%H2388><s%> and strengthen וּמֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֖ <S%H4475><s%> thy government אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and I will commit בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְאָ֛ב <S%H1><s%> and he shall be a father לְיוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וּלְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <S%H5414><s%> will I lay מַפְתֵּ֥חַ <S%H4668><s%> And the key בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <S%H7926><s%> upon his shoulder וּפָתַח֙ <S%H6605><s%> so he shall open וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no סֹגֵ֔ר <S%H5462><s%> and none shall shut וְסָגַ֖ר <S%H5462><s%> and he shall shut וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> one פֹּתֵֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> and none shall open

וּתְקַעְתִּ֥יו <S%H8628><s%> And I will fasten יָתֵ֖ד <S%H3489><s%> him [as] a nail בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place נֶאֱמָ֑ן <S%H539><s%> in a sure וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְכִסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> throne כָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and he shall be for a glorious לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> to his father's

וְתָל֨וּ <S%H8518><s%> And they shall hang עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> on כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> upon him all the glory בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> of his father's הַצֶּֽאֱצָאִים֙ <S%H6631><s%> the offspring וְהַצְּפִע֔וֹת <S%H6849><s%> and the issue כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> all vessels הַקָּטָ֑ן <S%H6996><s%> of small מִכְּלֵי֙ <S%H3627><s%> quantity from the vessels הָֽאַגָּנ֔וֹת <S%H101><s%> of cups וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> even to all the vessels הַנְּבָלִֽים׃ <S%H5035><s%> of flagons

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts תָּמוּשׁ֙ <S%H4185><s%> be removed הַיָּתֵ֔ד <S%H3489><s%> shall the nail הַתְּקוּעָ֖ה <S%H8628><s%> that is fastened בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place נֶאֱמָ֑ן <S%H539><s%> in the sure וְנִגְדְּעָ֣ה <S%H1438><s%> and be cut down וְנָפְלָ֗ה <S%H5307><s%> and fall וְנִכְרַת֙ <S%H3772><s%> that [was] upon it shall be cut off הַמַּשָּׂ֣א <S%H4853><s%> and the burden אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ס
